name: Station to Station (itch)
description:
Station to Station is a #slowgame made to recreate the feeling of watching the world go by whilst on a train.

  • Passengers embark on a long journey through up to 8 abstract zones.
  • Journey times may vary (1hr 30 mins - 4 hours).
  • Best played as a backdrop to another activity and occasionally glanced at.

Made by @uk_resistant
